name: Hfnss

types.name: Pixel
types.comment: This just represents whether a pixel is filled or not. Most implementations of Hfnss are gray text on a black background so `Gray` and `Black` are used. "Gray" and "Black" are colors obviously, but here they are just stand ins for a pixel being drawn or not. Any color would do.

values.name: get
values.comment: Give `get` a char, and youll get the data for that character.
